item.description:
Learn to play Golf - Improve your Golfing Skills? Don’t pay $50/hour for Lessons

Discount Group Golf Lessons
Do you want to learn to play Golf? Want to improve your Golfing Skills?
Don’t pay $50/hour for Golf Lessons – Learn from the Pros for only $17/hour with Golf 101 and Golf 102 Lessons

Golf is a very popular and challenging sport, and Golf is the language of Business - many business deals and relationships are developed on the Golf course

Spend some quality time outside and get some great exercise!

Golf 101 is designed for the new or beginning Golfer, teaching proper Golf technique including Driving, Putting, Chipping, Golfing rules, Video Swing Analysis, and playing out on the Golf Course. This course is ideal for all ages, new Golfers, children and families, or anyone breaking in new equipment or needs to improve their skills.




Golf 102 consists of Playing Lessons on a 9-hole course while the Certified Golf Instructor helps you improve your skills. It is a great course for the more experienced golfer, and for Golf 101 graduates.

Golf 101 and Golf 102 class sizes are kept small (9 students) to ensure personal attention, and is only $100 for 6 hours of instruction. All equipment including golf balls, golf clubs and fees are included, or you can bring their own clubs.

Golf 101 and Golf 101 lessons are held at Minor Hills Golf Club in Middletown, CT (Exit 20 off I-91) and lessons start on Sunday April 5 2009, and Tuesday and Thursday evenings are also available. Students select their dates and times of lessons. The current lesson schedule is available on http://www.GolfLesson...


Lessons are held at:

Miner Hills Golf Course and Driving Range
85 Miner Hills Drive
Middletown, CT 06457

PURCHASE YOUR SPOT ONLINE AND SAVE 33%!

6 hours of Lessons -$100 Online ($17 per hour) Pay with Credit Card using the Buy Now/Pay Pal button

or $150 at the course ($25 per hour CASH ONLY) if any space is available.
Please call (860) 436-9449 for available space before the lesson

LESSONS ARE HELD ON:

Saturdays 4-6 pm

Sundays 4-6 pm

Tuesday 6-8 pm

Thursday 6-8 pm

For more information, visit http://www.GolfLesson... or call (860) 436-9449

See You On The Course!

WHAT OUR STUDENTS ARE SAYING:

“ Golf 101 was a fun and inexpensive way to learn Golf from the beginning. Having never golfed before, I was nervous, but our Instructor George did a great job teaching our group, and I am having a great time in Golf 102!”
Rodney P, New Haven CT

“ Inexpensive, high quality Lessons in a small group, I made new golfing buddies and am enjoying the game of golf”
June B, Bloomfield CT

“ I have taken lessons from golf pros before, but Golf 102 Playing Lessons were more effective and less expensive than any other lessons.”
Jim S, Newington CT

“ I was not sure if I would enjoy Golfing so I tried Golf 101 and I love it! The Instructor was very patient and answered all my questions, and made the lessons fun!”
Gloria W, Milford, CT
item.how_to_find_us: Look for us in the white www.CTGolfTips.com Hats
